Name: Miracle Circus
About the game: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 人物介绍： Qi: A new entrant to the circus(genius magician). Ning: Main member of the circus, who seems to know everything. Liu: Member of the circus, who agrees with Liao often (acting partner of Liao). Liao: The circus chief, who inherits it from his father(responsible for the circus affairs). Xiang: Main member of the circus, who is a wild animal trainer(the playmate of the pet Li). Ji: Main member of the circus, who is good at acrobatics of high difficulty. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Game Introduction: The ceremony to worship demons is inaugurated in the World Center. The mouth of sin is open, which will lead to the climax—— As a new member of the circus, tonight is his first show. The whole family would welcome Qi’s coming, however, behind the peace and beauty of the night, A violent orgy seems to wait for being triggered. Qi is pushed near edge step by step because of the suddenly appeared “evil”, so-called “monster” and the reality of people behind their masks. How to escape? Our dear genius magician would bring you—— Ah, just a valueless story to kill the night. Please be seated—— The show, is gonna begin..... ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Features: Different pictures, with weird and suspenseful atmosphere, and various plot branches. This is a performance without a unified ending. It concludes 6 different game endings. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
